amendment.description: Amendment deletes language which prevents funding for certain Amtrak routes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike language in the matter related to "Department of Transportation--Federal Railroad Administration--Grants to National Railroad Passenger Corporation", strike "none of the funds herein" and all that follows through "further, That".

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Brown, Corrine.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown, Corrine amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 269 - 152 (Roll no. 336).
